alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 4:04AM CDT until March 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 39 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...East slopes of the Franklin and Organ mountains. In addition, Luna, Dona Ana, and western portions of El Paso county. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County
